sourcesContent:
// scene
export const CANVAS_WIDTH = 1500
export const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 800
export const leftRightMargin = 80
export const topBottomMargin = 80
export const BACKGROUND_COLOR = "#0f3968"

// bird
export const maxSpeed = 300
export const minSpeed = 5
export const RADIUS = 5
export const BIRD_COLOR = "#ffffff"

// updating bird's posiiton/velocity
export const PROTECTED_RANGE_DISTANCE = 8
export const SEP_FACTOR = 0.05
export const ALIGN_FACTOR = 0.05
export const COHESION_FACTOR = 0.0005

// turning screen edge rate
export const turnFactor = 5

// others
export const BIRDS_NUM = 5
export const visibleRangeDistance = 40
